messages.text:
Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM but i like mine better.
gerunds suck.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5376041/diff/1/src/pkg/regexp/regexp.go
File src/pkg/regexp/regexp.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5376041/diff/1/src/pkg/regexp/regexp.go#newcode4
src/pkg/regexp/regexp.go:4: // Package regexp implements regular expression matching.
why not just
// Package regexp implements regular expressions.
?

// Package regexp implements regular expression search.

?

On Nov 9, 2011, at 10:35 AM, Russ Cox wrote:

> // Package regexp implements regular expression search.
> 
> ?

sure

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=efc8b38cbfdb ***

regexp: fix doc comment

Fixes issue 2432.
